long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decypher is a digital wallet for Dijets and other digital assets. 

With the Decypher browser extension you can send and receive funds on Dijets Utility Chain and interact with Dijets services i.e Dijetex, Architect, Vault, Creed & Mercer.  

The extension seamlessly integrates with Dijets products and services for authentication and transaction signing without risking or disclosing access to your private keys, which are stored securely within the extension’s storage space and encrypted with your password.
